entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023
